subject: Is this a bug in xmlunit 0.8 version??
msgSnippet: Hi! I am trying to compare two xml files which has CDATA Section as below.. The  xmlunit0.8 version is saying that they are not equal.. is this a bug in
messageBody:
Hi!

I am trying to compare two xml files which has CDATA Section as below..


The xmlunit0.8 version is saying that they are not equal.. is this a
bug in xmlunit?


If i remove \n after the CDATA Section as pointed out in the comment,
then it is saying they are equal..

Thanking you in advance

Regards,
Nagendra



public class TestXMLTagTexts extends XMLTestCase
{

public void setUp() throws Exception
{
DocumentBuilderFactory lDBFactory =
DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance();
lDBFactory.setNamespaceAware( true );
lDBFactory.setValidating( false );
XMLUnit.setControlDocumentBuilderFactory( lDBFactory );
XMLUnit.setIgnoreWhitespace( true );
}//setUp()

public void testCDATASectionVarient2() throws Exception
{
String lInput =
"<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl=\"http://www.w3.org/TR/WD-xsl\">" +
"<xsl:script>\n" +
"\n" +
"//ADDGLOBALSHERE\n" +
"\n" +
"<![CDATA[ //> end CDATA tag for VID colorizing\n" +
"var rgDate=new Array();\n" +
"//>\n" +
"]]>\n" + //if i remve this \n then it works fine..
"</xsl:script>\n" +
"\n" +
"</xsl:stylesheet>\n";

String lExpectation =
"<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl=\"http://www.w3.org/TR/WD-xsl\">" +
"<xsl:script>" +
"\n\n//ADDGLOBALSHERE\n\n" +
"<![CDATA[ //> end CDATA tag for VID colorizing\n" +
"var rgDate=new Array();\n" +
"//>\n" +
"]]>" +
"</xsl:script>\n" +
"</xsl:stylesheet>\n";

assertXMLEqual( lInput, lExpectation );
}//testCDATASectionVarient2()

public static void main( String[] args )
{
TestSuite testSuite = new TestSuite();
testSuite.addTest( new TestXMLTagTexts( "testCDATASectionVarient2" ) );
junit.textui.TestRunner.run( testSuite );

}//main()
}//class TestXMLTagTexts
